settings.portalLinksDesc: Add custom links to your portal header
settings.portalContactDesc: Display contact options on your portal
settings.deleteWorkspaceDescription: Permanently delete this workspace and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteWorkspaceConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? All categories, walkthroughs, and media will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
settings.portalBackgroundDescription: Custom background for your public portal
settings.portalContactDescription: Add contact information that will appear at the top of your portal
settings.portalLinksDescription: Add buttons with external links that will appear at the top of your portal (e.g., link to your website, support page, etc.)
settings.planManagementDescription: Manage your subscription and plan settings
settings.deleteWorkspaceWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the workspace, all categories, and all walkthroughs under it forever.
settings.deleteConfirmMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete:
settings.textSizeDescription: Adjust text size throughout the application
settings.previewBodyText: This is how body text will look
settings.previewHeadingText: This is how headings will look
settings.inviteDescription: Invite users to collaborate on this workspace
settings.workspaceMembersDescription: People who have access to this workspace

quota.workspaceQuota: Quota usage for this specific workspace

warnings.cannotUploadMore: You cannot upload more files. Please delete some files or upgrade your plan.
warnings.considerDeleting: Consider deleting unused files or upgrading your plan.
warnings.approachingWorkspaceLimitDesc: You are approaching your workspace limit. You'll need to upgrade to create more.
warnings.approachingWalkthroughLimitDesc: You are approaching your walkthrough limit. You'll need to upgrade to create more.
warnings.approachingCategoryLimitDesc: You are approaching your category limit. You'll need to upgrade to create more.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.storageExceeded: You have exceeded your storage quota. Upgrade to get more storage space.
upgrade.fileSizeExceeded: This file exceeds your plan's maximum file size limit. Upgrade to upload larger files.
upgrade.workspacesExceeded: You have reached your workspace limit. Upgrade to create more workspaces.
upgrade.walkthroughsExceeded: You have reached your walkthrough limit. Upgrade for unlimited walkthroughs.
upgrade.categoriesExceeded: You have reached your category limit. Upgrade for unlimited categories.
upgrade.genericMessage: Upgrade your plan to unlock more features and higher limits.
upgrade.selectPlanDescription: Select a plan to get started. You can change your plan anytime.
upgrade.changePlanDescription: Select a new plan. Your current usage will be preserved.

builder.deleteVersionConfirm: Delete version {{version}}? This cannot be undone.
builder.noVersions: No versions yet. A version is created each time you publish.
builder.imageRecoveryDescription: This tool attempts to recover image URLs from version snapshots. If snapshots were saved with empty image URLs, recovery won't be possible and you'll need to re-upload the images.
builder.imagesFoundInSnapshots: Images were found in version snapshots. You can recover them by merging blocks from a previous version into your current walkthrough.
builder.noRecoverableImages: No recoverable images found in version snapshots.
builder.emptyImageUrls: The version snapshots were saved with empty image URLs. This means the images cannot be automatically recovered.
builder.reuploadManually: You will need to re-upload the images manually by clicking on each empty image block and uploading the file again.
builder.passwordStoredAsHash: This is only stored as a hash on the server.
builder.enterUrlOrUpload: Enter a URL or upload an image
builder.noCategoriesAvailable: No categories available. Create categories in the Categories page.
builder.selectCategoriesForWalkthrough: Select one or more categories for this walkthrough
builder.buildingTipsDescription: Helpful tips for creating effective walkthroughs

tips.recordGifsDesc: Use ScreenToGIF (free Windows app) to record screen captures as animated GIFs. Perfect for step-by-step demonstrations.
tips.tickWhenFinished: Set Step to Tick When Finished
tips.tickWhenFinishedDesc: Change navigation type to 'Check-off Required' to make users confirm completion before advancing. Great for important steps.
tips.commonProblemsDesc: Click on a step, then select 'Common Problems' to add troubleshooting tips. Helps users solve issues independently.
tips.optimizeImagesDesc: Compress images to reduce file size and improve loading speed. Use tools like TinyPNG or Squoosh for best results.
tips.clearTitlesDesc: Write concise, action-oriented titles. Users should understand what they'll do in each step at a glance.
tips.externalLinksDesc: Add links in text blocks to reference documentation, videos, or other helpful resources for deeper learning.
tips.testMobileDesc: Preview your walkthrough on mobile to ensure it looks good and works smoothly on smaller screens.
tips.useVideoDesc: For multi-step processes, consider using video instead of static images. Videos can show the full sequence clearly.

messages.uploadImageToStart: Upload an image to start adding annotations
messages.interactiveMarkersAppear: Interactive markers will appear on the image

builder.editTextDirectly: Edit text directly in the canvas. Use keyboard shortcuts:

landing.heroDescription: Build beautiful, step-by-step guides with rich media. Track engagement, gather feedback, and help your users succeed.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features to create, manage, and optimize your walkthroughs
landing.featureInteractiveDesc: Create step-by-step guides with rich media and interactive elements
landing.featureBuilderDesc: Form-based or drag-and-drop builder for creating guides effortlessly
landing.featureMultiTenantDesc: Each company gets their own branded portal with complete isolation
landing.featureAnalyticsDesc: Track views, completions, and drop-off rates with detailed insights
landing.featureEmbeddableDesc: Embed walkthroughs anywhere with iframe or JS widget
landing.ctaDescription: Join companies creating better user experiences with interactive walkthroughs

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.resetTooltip: Reset all analytics data for this walkthrough
analytics.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all analytics data for "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

knowledgeSystems.title: Knowledge Systems
knowledgeSystems.description: Manage isolated knowledge systems with dedicated editors and portals.

policy.title: Policies
policy.description: Official policies and procedures with legal authority and compliance standards.
policy.officialDescription: These policies establish official guidelines and requirements. All personnel are required to comply with these policies as applicable to their roles and responsibilities. This documentation carries full legal authority.
policy.noPoliciesDescription: Policy content has not been published yet. Check back later for official documentation.

procedure.title: Procedures
procedure.description: Step-by-step operational procedures for consistent execution and compliance.
procedure.standardDescription: These procedures establish standardized workflows and best practices. Follow each step systematically to ensure consistent, high-quality results across all operations.
procedure.noProceduresDescription: Standard procedures have not been published yet. Check back later for operational guidelines.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.noDocsDescription: Documentation has not been published yet. Check back later for reference materials.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.noFAQsDescription: FAQ content has not been published yet. Check back later for answers to common questions.
faq.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all categories.

decisionTree.title: Decision Trees
decisionTree.noDecisionsDescription: Decision trees have not been published yet. Check back later for decision-making guides.

blocked.title: Account Disabled
blocked.message: Your account has been disabled or deleted.

onboardingTour.waiting: Waiting for element to be ready...

welcome.title: Welcome to InterGuide!
welcome.body: Let's get you started with a quick tour to create your first workspace, category, and walkthrough.

createWorkspace.title: Create Your First Workspace
createWorkspace.body: Click the "+ New Workspace" button to create a workspace for organizing your guides.

workspaceForm.title: Set Up Your Workspace
workspaceForm.body: Enter a workspace name and brand color. Logo and background are optional and can be added later.

enterWorkspace.title: Enter Your Workspace
enterWorkspace.body: Great! Now click on your newly created workspace to enter it.

goCategories.title: Navigate to Categories
goCategories.body: Before creating guides, let's create a category to organize them. Click the "Categories" tab.

createCategory.title: Create Your First Category
createCategory.body: Categories help organize your walkthroughs. Click "+ New Category" to create one.

goGuides.title: Navigate to Guides
goGuides.body: Perfect! Now let's create your first walkthrough. Click the "Guides" tab to go back.

createWalkthrough.title: Create Your First Walkthrough
createWalkthrough.body: Click "+ New Walkthrough" to create an interactive guide.

addFirstStep.title: Add Content to Your Walkthrough
addFirstStep.body: Click the "+" button to add a step, give it a title, then click "+" again to add content blocks.

billing.keepAccessUntil: You will keep Pro access until {{date}}.
billing.endOfBillingPeriod: the end of your billing period
billing.noFurtherCharges: No further charges will occur after this date unless you re-subscribe.
billing.finalStatusByPayPal: Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.cancelledByPayPalDesc: PayPal has confirmed the cancellation. No further charges will occur. Verified by PayPal.
billing.cancellationPendingDesc: Cancellation request sent. PayPal confirmation pending. Your access remains active until the end of the period. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.subscribeDescription: Complete your subscription to unlock Pro features. Your subscription will be activated automatically.
billing.paymentsProcessedByPayPal: Payments are processed by PayPal. By subscribing, you agree to our
billing.autoRenewNotice: Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled through your PayPal account. Invoices and receipts are sent by PayPal.
billing.proRequiresPayPal: Pro plan requires PayPal subscription. After creating your account, go to Dashboard and click "Upgrade to Pro" to subscribe via PayPal. The 14-day trial starts after PayPal approves your payment.
billing.planSelectionNote: You can start with the Free plan and upgrade anytime. Pro plan includes a 14-day free trial that starts after PayPal approves your subscription payment. Subscribe via PayPal to begin your trial.
billing.subscriptionDetails: Your subscription details and billing information
billing.afterTrialBilling: After the trial, billing will occur at $5/month as determined by PayPal.
billing.subscriptionCancelledDesc: Your subscription will remain active until {{date}}. After that, your account will be downgraded to the Free plan. No further charges will occur after this date unless you re-subscribe. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.subscriptionActiveDesc: Your Pro subscription is active. Renewal is managed by PayPal according to your subscription terms.
billing.activatingSubscriptionDesc: PayPal is processing your subscription. This may take up to 1 minute. You can continue using the app.
billing.cardOnlyDisclaimer: Payments made without a PayPal account are still managed by PayPal and renew automatically unless cancelled.
billing.cancelledByPayPalFullDesc: PayPal has confirmed the cancellation. No further charges will occur. Pro access until {{date}}. Verified by PayPal.
billing.cancellationPendingFullDesc: Cancellation request sent. PayPal confirmation pending. Your access remains active until {{date}}. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.subscriptionRemainsActive: Your subscription will remain active until {{date}}. No further charges will occur after this date unless you re-subscribe. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.cancelledConfirmedDesc: PayPal has confirmed the cancellation. No further charges will occur. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.cancellationProcessingDesc: PayPal is processing the cancellation. Your access remains active until the end of the period. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.

confirm.endWalkthrough: Are you sure you want to end this walkthrough?
confirm.archiveWalkthrough: Are you sure you want to move "{{title}}" to archive? You can restore it later from the Archive page.
confirm.deleteCategoryWithChildren: Delete "{{name}}" and all its sub-categories? Walkthroughs will become uncategorized.
confirm.cancelInvitation: Are you sure you want to cancel this invitation?
confirm.removeMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
confirm.deletePolicy: Are you sure you want to delete this policy?
confirm.disableUser: Disable {{email}}? They will not be able to log in.
confirm.softDeleteUser: Soft delete {{email}}? This will mark the user as deleted but preserve their data.
confirm.permanentDeleteUser:
PERMANENT DELETE: {{email}}

This will PERMANENTLY delete:
- User account
- All workspaces owned by user
- All walkthroughs and categories
- All uploaded files
- All subscriptions and data

This action CANNOT be undone!

Type the user's email to confirm deletion.

alert.noSupportContact: Support contact information not configured. Please contact the walkthrough creator.
alert.emailMismatch: Email did not match. Deletion cancelled.

categories.deleted: Category deleted. Walkthroughs are now uncategorized.
